DataElement.preferredName: Candidate Pediatric Clinical Study CPTAC Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response to indicate whether or not the candidate participating in the pediatric study.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Someone or something considered as suitable or likely for something._Having to do with children._Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Someone or something considered as suitable or likely for something.

Concepts.definition: Someone or something considered as suitable or likely for something.

Property.preferredDefinition: Having to do with children.:Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.

Concepts.definition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: patients' acknowledgement and acceptance of participation in a clinical trial.
